namelist:
############################################################################### namelist_AutoAssess_radiation_rms_cfMon_all.xml
Description Diagnostics of spatial RMS errors of radiation and clouds
Author Yoko Tsushima (Met Office, United Kingdom - yoko.tsushima@metoffice.gov.uk)
Contributor Simon Read (University of Reading, United Kingdom)
Project CMUG
References Technical report or a paper will be written in the future.
This namelist is part of the ESMValTool ###############################################################################
False False False @{WORKPATH} @{PLOTPATH} @{CLIMOPATH} True 100 500 1 P_cmug
[
ESGF_CMIP5 MRI-CGCM3 output1 MRI MRI-CGCM3 amip mon atmos cfMon r1i1p1 latest 1985 1988 CMIP5_template ESGF_CMIP5 HadGEM2-A output1 MOHC HadGEM2-A amip mon atmos cfMon r1i1p1 latest 1985 1988 CMIP5_template obs4mips ISCCP L3 V1.0 1985 1988 @{OBSPATH}/Tier1
Low-intermediate Cloud ./variable_defs/ cllmtisccp T4M
./nml/cfg_AutoAssess AutoAssess_radiation_rms.py [('execute_as_shell', False)]
Low-thick Cloud ./variable_defs/ clltkisccp T4M
./nml/cfg_AutoAssess AutoAssess_radiation_rms.py [('execute_as_shell', False)]
Middle-intermediate Cloud ./variable_defs/ clmmtisccp T4M
./nml/cfg_AutoAssess AutoAssess_radiation_rms.py [('execute_as_shell', False)]
Middle-thick Cloud ./variable_defs/ clmtkisccp T4M
./nml/cfg_AutoAssess AutoAssess_radiation_rms.py [('execute_as_shell', False)]
High-intermediate Cloud ./variable_defs/ clhmtisccp T4M
./nml/cfg_AutoAssess AutoAssess_radiation_rms.py [('execute_as_shell', False)]
High-thick Cloud ./variable_defs/ clhtkisccp T4M
./nml/cfg_AutoAssess AutoAssess_radiation_rms.py [('execute_as_shell', False)]
./esgf_config.xml
